author: holiman
content: What is the best source of various keys/formats/algos/relationships within 2.0-space? I would like to extend clef to support those usecases too, but am not quite sure where to begin

author: protolambda
content: <@144468805697929216> has done a lot of work on golang keystore and wallet implementations for eth2. You should chat <@211091239112671234>

author: jgm
content: Thanks <@!203220829473996800> .  <@!211091239112671234> happy to chat.  Also various libraries at https://github.com/wealdtech with the prefix `go-eth2`
